summary: When Diancie a Pokémon said to create diamond travels to find Xerneas to help her make a heart diamond to save her home, Ash, Serena, Clemont and Bonnie help her to be safe on the way from thieves.
cast: Ikue Ôtani|Caitlin Glass|Sarah Natochenny|Haven Paschall|Mike Liscio|Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld|William Tost|David Wills|Lianne Marie Dobbs|Marc Thompson|Oliver Wyman|Brittney Lee Hamilton|Mary O'Brady|Kate Bristol|James Carter Cathcart|Wayne Grayson|Michele Knotz|Suzy Myers Jackson|Lisa Ortiz|Rodger Parsons|Tyler Bunch|Bill Rogers|Kayzie Rogers|Erica Schroeder|Eileen Stevens|Billy Bob Thompson|Tom Wayland|Annelie Berg|Ryan William Downey|Felix Engström|Dick Eriksson|Hilda Henze|My Holmsten|Christa Lips|Andreas Nilsson|Dorothea Norling|Adam Portnoff|Dominique Pålsson Wiklund|Amanda Renberg|Megumi Satô|Henrik Ståhl|Kim Sulocki
title: La Película Pokémon: Diancie y la crisálida de la destrucción
